info.description:
## Authentication options

### OAuth2 / OpenID Connect

The supported authentication method is OpenID Connect via Keycloak. For testing APIs via Swaggerhub or Swagger UI, please use **client_id** `swagger`.

When developing applications against this API, a separate client application must be registered in Keycloak.

### X-Token header authentication

Internal use only, deprecated. The core services use these authentication headers for system account based requests.
